scripts.build: tsc --build tsconfig.json && copyfiles -u 1 src/index.html src/manifest.json dist
scripts.watch: yarn clean && concurrently "tsc --build --watch tsconfig.json" "cpx 'src/index.html' dist -w" "cpx 'src/manifest.json' dist -w"
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf .cache && rimraf node_modules && rimraf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
